website_summaries.verdict: Glycinate form of chelated copper in a hypoallergenic supplement.
pros: Top rated for quality and purity
Reports of reduced pain and reversal of gray hairs
cons: Because it's so well-absorbed, we recommend monitoring your copper levels while taking

customer_reviews.title: It's like bad, bad arthritis
customer_reviews.text: Be careful with this product. I thought I needed more copper since my multi included only 500mcg. I knew nothing about glycinate, which I just found out is chelated. This form is highly absorbable, which means you might become copper toxic. I took just one pill and had a very rough time with it. Three days later my arms still hurt, as do my hands and feet. It's like bad, bad arthritis.
customer_reviews.author: DWAYNE SHULTS

customer_reviews.title: Gout and Gray Hair Treatment
customer_reviews.text: Use this with Magnesium Citrate to control gout. Works! Has the added benefit of slightly reversing the graying of my hair and beard.
customer_reviews.author: Gene D.

customer_reviews.title: Made my hair darker . . .
customer_reviews.text: Copper has value for our blood, cardiological & neurological systems & copper is important for hair color too. As a result when we have low copper levels one of the first signs can be gray hair. Taking this copper visibly darkened my hair tho I took it to be sure I was getting enough minerals because I'm 65, & not well. If I want copper beyond trace minerals or a multi-mineral compound or I want my hair darker I'll probably buy this again. I think this is a good copper, I like it, I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Steedley

customer_reviews.title: Mid 30's, being proactive on gray and thinning hair.
customer_reviews.text: Mid 30's.... Only been taking for 2wks now. I am impressed. Small pills, no odor, no flavor. Easy to swallow. Directions state you can take twice daily, I have only been taking once daily and have already noticed my hairline filling in more. Will post hair photos in another few weeks. So far, I have no complaints and highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Easy to digest and is slowly bringing my level up!
customer_reviews.text: I have had body pains for years and I just recently saw a Nutritionist that recommended a micro nutrient test. It showed that I am very deficient in Copper. I started taking these twice a day for the last couple months and I have slowly started feeling better and having less pain, which is always great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kaci

customer_reviews.title: Had a slight pain in my hand while lifting weights ...
customer_reviews.text: Had a slight pain in my hand while lifting weights.So alot of my focus had to change from arms and chect to legs. I read up on certain deficiencies that cause these problems and copper ended up being one of those deficiencies so I tried it.. After about 4 days of taking it my hands stopped hurting so I'm back to lifting again pain free..Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: L Stewart

customer_reviews.title: My miracle
customer_reviews.text: This little bottle of miracle solved so many of my problems: lack of energy,period cramps and it's definitely helping fading my spider veins. If only I could remember to take it every day!
customer_reviews.author: MAB

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: I use to have a copper IUD and when I removed it, my skin looked horrible. I know realized that it must be the lack of copper. I take these 1 every other day. My skin is back to looking normal. Im so greatful for these. I havent felt any side effects. I havent gotten any blood work done, but they dont check for this anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Pure Encapsulations - Copper (Glycinate) - Hypoallergenic Essential Mineral Supplement - 60 Capsules
product_meta.description: Copper activates a number of enzymes important to energy metabolism. It is the key mineral in lysyl oxidase, an enzyme that weaves together collagen and elastin. Copper assists in the formation of hemoglobin and red blood cells by facilitating iron absorption. It is involved in protein metabolism, the production of RNA, and the synthesis of phospholipids used in the formation of myelin sheaths.*
feature_bullets: Overall Health: Copper is a trace mineral that supports a number of crucial physiological processes.*
Iron Absorption: Copper assists in the formation of hemoglobin and red blood cells by facilitating iron absorption.*
Energy Metabolism Support: Copper activates a number of enzymes important to energy metabolism.*

Pure Ingredients: Pure Encapsulations manufactures a line of hypoallergenic, research-based dietary supplements. Products are meticulously formulated using pure ingredients designed to deliver predictable results for the benefit of all patients, even the most sensitive.*

Free From: Pure Encapsulations products are free from wheat, gluten, egg, peanuts, magnesium stearate, hydrogenated fat, artificial sweeteners and colors, and other unnecessary excipients. Any product containing ingredients derived from allergens, such as soy, dairy or shellfish is clearly labeled. *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
